scripts.stack1:destroy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.HelloCdkApp" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric

scripts.stack2:destroy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.HelloCdkApp2" --require-approval never --profile stratospheric
